photo.alt: Yellow temporary utility markings on wet concrete. They indicate property lines.
photo.caption: I read about utility markings in 99% Invisible Cities and now I see them everywhere.

photo.alt: A brick wall with a window into a half-basement office with a table and plant.
Barren trees next to a classical building on an overcast day.
photo.caption: Been trying to find other ways to record my feelings.

photo.alt: Ducks on the Charles River. Boston is covered in fog in the background.
A window. There is a tree in the foreground with eerily lit branches hanging down.
A person sits working in an empty classroom across a patch of grass.
photo.caption: Oh, to be working in an empty classroom over the holidays!
